net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario

Class StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario.AbstractScenario
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario.StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IScenario, JCLAL

    public class StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario
extends AbstractScenario
    Implementation of StreamBasedSelectiveSampling scenario. This scenario is sometimes called stream-based or sequential active.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Maria del Carmen Rodriguez Hernandez, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getThreshold

        public double getThreshold()
        Returns:
        The threshold used when the scenario is stream.

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(double threshold)
        Parameters:
        threshold - The threshold used when the scenario is stream.

      • instancesSelection

        public void instancesSelection()
        Selects the most informative instances sequentially according to the scenario, the query strategy and the batch mode. Stores the selected indexes of the instances in the query strategy.
